hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a medium-sized fish (child)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Bombchu Shop#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the souls of the Floormaster# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the souls of the Tektite# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Fishing Rod#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Fishing Rod#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Hylian Loach#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Fish Bottle#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #the souls of the Shabom# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a medium-sized fish (child)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Hylian Loach#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that @ deserves a hug. Everyone does!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?
